document_data.name: Sholapur chaka
document_data.mainbody: The '''Sholapur chaka''' was a prominent [[chaka]] within the [[Shining Lands]] in [[1367 DR]].
document_data.Organization: The Sholapurs owned most of [[Ship Isle]] off the coast of [[Var the Golden]] near [[Myrmyr]]. Their shipyards produced the finest merchant vessels in all of the Shining Lands, making them an extremely wealthy chaka.
document_data.Base of Operations: The Sholapur chaka was based out of Myrmyr in eastern Var the Golden.
